Description:
We are Hiring:Integrant wants to hire a Network/System Security Lead with the primary goal to provide and maintain high-quality IT services for internal staff and Integrant clients. Candidate will be responsible for setting, maintaining, and executing the following information technology strategies:Research, analyze, evaluate, and offer recommendations on emerging security technologies and solutions to protect next generation modern endpoint environments.
Design, implement, configure, and manage solutions within the supported technologies, products, and services.
Define security configurations for threat detection and prevention tools, implementing disaster recovery and back-up procedures
Proactively manage supported services ensuring performance, availability, and security.Research and recommend innovative and automated approaches for operational tasks
Integrate threat, vulnerability, IT, and business to prioritize incident handling and investigations
Monitor performance and maintain systems according to requirements
Troubleshoot issues and outages
Develop expertise to train staff on new technologiesBuild an internal wiki with technical documentation, manuals, and IT policies
Share best practices among team members.
Monitoring, coaching and counseling IT team members.
Responsible for mitigating problems that may hinder IT projects delivery successful.Job Details
